quote_first: When the last lid had been placed back on he checked the clock on the wall:
quote_last: . Just enough time to glance in the other box and see if he could expect the same again.
title: A Matter of Honor
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: . Six minutes to go. Suddenly I felt quite clearheaded. There was an unexpected light in the cell; the boundaries were drawn, the roles well defined. The time of doubt and questioning and uncertainty was over.
title: Dawn: A Novel
author: Elie Wiesel
